text:
Shares on Wall Street fell on Tuesday as the
U.S. dollar hit a near two-month high... and

investors fretted over Britain's exit from
the European Union.

The Dow Jones Industrial Average lost nearly
half-a-percent,... the S&P 500 roughly the

same,... while the tech heavy Nasdaq edged
down zero-point-two percent.

The dollar index,... which measures the greenback's
performance against six major currencies,...
hit its highest level in almost two months.

The greenback has been on a strong footing
from the start of the week,... and got a boost

following comments from Richmond Fed president
Jeffrey Lacker who said there was a strong

Another focus of investors is Brexit -- after
British Prime Minister Theresa May said the

UK would begin negotiations to leave the EU
by March.
On that, the pound slumped to a 31-year-low.
